si.title: கொமர்ஷல் வங்கி Gnext Store உடன் இணைந்து Apple   சாதனங்களுக்கு 18 மாத கடனை வழங்குகிறது
body_lines: Commercial Bank and Authorized Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Devices
கொமர்ஷல் வங்கியானது நாடு முழுவதும் தந்திரோபாயரீதியாக அமைக்கப்பட்ட  கிளைகள் மற்றும் தானியங்கி இயந்திரங்களின் வலையமைப்பைச் செயற்படுத்திவருகின்றது.
මීට අමතරව, බැංකුවේ පූර්ණ-සම්මානලාභීන්, සීබීසී ෆිනෑන්ස් ලිමිටඩ් සහ වාණිජ රක්ෂණ තැරැව්කරුවන් (පුද්) සමාගම තමන්ගේම ශාඛා ජාල හරහා විවිධ මූල්ය සේවා සපයයි.

en.title: Commercial Bank offers 18 -month loan to Apple devices in conjunction with GNEXT Store
body_lines: Commercial Bank and Authorized Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Electronic Devices
The Commercial Bank operates the network of branches and automated machines across the country.
In addition, the bank's full -fledged subsidiaries, CBC Finance LTD and Commercial Insurance Brokers (Pvt) Limited, also offer various financial services through their own branch networks.
